messages.content: Hello! How can I assist you today?

instead of asking conversation name to create, assign a appopiate name based on the conversation

paraphrase it
Instead of asking for a conversation name to create, assign a suitable name based on the discussion.
Hello again! How can I help you?
create one new conversation once after the conversation chat starts allow user to create a new conversation again
Once the conversation begins, create a new chat. After that, allow the user to initiate a new conversation whenever they wish.
create a new chat create, Once the conversation begins After that, allow the user to initiate a new conversation whenever they wishno need to create until the conversation begins in new chat
Create a new chat only after the conversation starts. Once it begins, allow the user to initiate a new conversation whenever they want, without needing to create a new chat beforehand.

Create one new conversaTION WHILE CLICKING NEW BUTTON , IF USER CREATE CLICK NEW BUTTON AGAIN WITH OUT THE CONVERSATION BEGINS wait for user use the created new conversation and then is user allow user to create a new conversation

Create a new conversation when the user clicks the "New" button. If the user clicks the "New" button again before the conversation has started, wait for them to use the created conversation before allowing them to create another new conversation.
once user loads the webiste , create a tempoary chat no need to shoe side title bar , once user login / signup how the conversation history in side title bar
Once the user loads the website, create a temporary chat without displaying the side title bar. After the user logs in or signs up, show the conversation history in the side title bar.
in auth status div element place only the name of the user , instead show the option as logout and switch user and temporary chat
In the authentication status div element, display only the user's name instead of showing options for logout, switch user, or temporary chat.

change the name from vinod-chatbot title to ConvoGPT fully wheever its required 
assign the logo from ConvoGPT.png
Change the title from "Vinod-Chatbot" to "ConvoGPT" wherever it is required. Additionally, assign the logo from "ConvoGPT.png."
